snippet: As the rhetoric from Kim Jong-un escalates and becomes even more aggressive, the world powers have to figure out how to solve this urgent challenge.
abstract: Editorial calls on world powers to figure out how to solve urgent challenge posed by North Korea as rhetoric from Kim Jong-un escalates and becomes even more aggressive; underlines fact that China remains central to any coherent strategy for curbing North Korea's nuclear program.
lead_paragraph: As the rhetoric from Kim Jong-un escalates and becomes even more aggressive, the world powers have to figure out how to solve this urgent challenge.
